title: LG reveals the StanbyME Go, a portable tablet with its own stylish suitcase
description: The StanbyME Go may have surprisingly good audio, great for drowning out the noise at your next picnic date.

title: Chromebooks can now run Minecraft natively, and this is great news
description: Minecraft fans rejoice, as the title along with its recent update is now natively playable on Chromebook.

title: Cisco Webex will now catch you up on any meetings you miss
description: Webex embraces generative AI to make sure users don't miss out on valuable meetings.

title: Cyberpunk 2077, Diablo IV, and more can run on a Mac thanks to this new toolkit
description: Thanks to a new toolkit revealed during WWDC 2023, any Windows games can run on M1 and M2 Mac systems.

title: Cisco is aiming to make your data center, and your company, greener than ever
description: Sustainability is now one of Cisco's top priorities, CEO Chuck Robbins says.

title: Samsung’s incredible Galaxy projector smartphone now has a heir: Meet the Tank 2
description: Rugged smartphone vendors think outside of the box to deliver some stunning designs

title: The official NASA website has some out-of-this-world security flaws
description: A vulnerability was present for months, despite being spotted twice already.

title: I hate WordPress’ new generative AI tool - and you should too
description: WordPress is introducing a new AI tool that will generate text and help you write blog posts, which sucks for bloggers.

title: League of Legends is getting its own Coca-Cola flavor and I can't even
description: Coca-Cola has launched a new League of Legends-inspired drink which comes alongside some in-game bonus items.

title: Apple Maps will finally get this useful Google Maps feature in iOS 17
description: Apple has confirmed that Apple Maps will get offline functionality in iOS 17.

title: Starfield controller images appear ahead of this week's Xbox Games Showcase
description: Images of a Starfield-themed Xbox controller have appeared online ahead of the Xbox Games Showcase.

title: FBI warns that compromising deepfakes are on the rise
description: AI-generated indecent images have been circling the Internet since April, as the FBI issues major warning.

title: Junji Ito-inspired horror game World of Horror has mysteries and horrors
description: Junji Ito-inspired Roguelike World of Horror is set to release later this year, and it’s content is more than just unsettling.

title: If you read just one thing today: Sony's new 5-star budget earbuds just got even cheaper
description: Sony's excellent WF-C700N noise canceling earbuds only launched in April and they've just got a 15% price cut – but it won't last long.

title: Many Android apps have been installing adware for half a year
description: Tens of thousands of apps were recently discovered, tricking people into installing adware.

title: HBO just canceled one of the best detective shows, but it's still worth watching on Max
description: HBO has canceled Perry Mason after two seasons, but that doesn't mean the legal drama isn't still worth streaming.

title: You can now preorder Google's new AI tool for Workspace
description: Google Duet will be available later this year, but you can get your order in now.

title: 1Password is bringing its public passkey beta to your browser

title: Email is still the most vulnerable communication tool in your business
description: Threats often make it past email security solutions and into people's inboxes.

title: Arnie's FUBAR still tops Netflix charts, but number 8 is a perfect summer TV show
description: FUBAR continues to top Netflix's 10 most watched shows list, but we prefer something on fire for summer.

title: Microsoft is willing to sacrifice Teams in Windows 11 – and I’m OK with that
description: Microsoft gets spooked by EU, might let us finally rid Windows 11 of Teams.

title: Sony's 2023 OLED, mini-LED and LCD TVs are now on sale, but something's missing

title: Apple calling the Vision Pro ‘great value’ shows it’s living in another reality
description: Apple CEO has called the Vision Pro headset 'great value' in an interview – and that confirms that it isn't a consumer device yet.

title: Bioware dropping Star Wars: The Old Republic to concentrate on Dragon Age and Mass Effect, report says
description: EA is moving the support and running of its MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic to a third-party studio to free up Bioware to concentrate on Dragon Age and Mass Effect.

title: Apple has rejected almost a million apps from its App Store
description: The apps were asking for too much information and requesting too many permissions.

title:
New 15-inch Apple MacBook Air
preorders: cost, discounts, and what you need to know

title: Diablo 4 is Blizzard's fastest-selling game ever, but you'll have to take the company's word for it
description: Blizzard has announced that Diablo 4 is its best-selling game of all time, but is yet to share specific figures publicly.

title: Microsoft might let you remove Chat from Teams - just so it can avoid legal trouble
description: You may soon be able to uninstall Windows 11 Chat (another Teams app) to help Microsoft in its EU antitrust case.

description: Valve has made yet another significant change to the tactical FPS title Counter Strike 2 before its summer launch.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 and Z Fold 5 accidentally confirmed for late July

title: WD Black's latest SSD for PS5 is here, and it's not cheap
